relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare named in 2024 Gartner Magic Quadrant for SV-SASE. Announcement >

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare CASB
relatedBlades.subtitle: A modern, SASE-native cloud access security broker (CASB)
relatedBlades.copy: Our CASB provides comprehensive visibility and control over your SaaS applications, so you can easily eliminate the risk of compromise, prevent data loss, and avoid compliance violations.

columnContent.title: Comprehensive visibility and control
columnContent.description: Use our API integrations to continuously scan SaaS applications for misconfigurations, exposed files, and suspicious activity  and remediate risks as they arise.

columnContent.title: Regulate access control
columnContent.description: Apply identity-aware, context-driven Zero Trust policies to control how and where users access your applications.

columnContent.title: Granular data protection
columnContent.description: Apply consistent, granular DLP controls across cloud applications to block accidental or risky data sharing.

columnContent.title: Simplified compliance
columnContent.description: Ensure better visibility across your application portfolio to minimize data loss and meet compliance requirements  including GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA, and more.

relatedBlades.title: Simplify the way you protect your SaaS applications
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare's multimode CASB helps deliver unified cloud security for SaaS applications. To secure data at rest, simple API integrations continuously scan your applications for vulnerabilities and potential risks.

Our Zero Trust access (ZTNA), gateway (SWG), and browser isolation (RBI) controls are seamlessly deployed as an inline CASB  no additional configurations needed.

imageAssetFile.altText: CASB - Solutions Page - SaaS Application Diagram
imageAssetFile.title: CASB - Solutions Page - SaaS Application Diagram

relatedBlades.title: Learn how CASB works within Cloudflare's SASE platform

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named in 2024 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Single-Vendor SASE
columnContent.description: We believe this recognition is a testament to Cloudflare's "light branch, heavy cloud" architecture and its ability to help global, cloud-minded enterprises accelerate their network modernization.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare a Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave: Security Service Edge Solutions, Q1 2024
columnContent.description: Cloudflare received the highest score in the global network criterion. We believe this recognition validates our commitment to build SASE "the right way," converging network and security services on a composable, programmable connectivity cloud.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE
columnContent.description: Through its 2023 SASE market analysis, KuppingerCole Analysts AG cited several Cloudflare strengths such as our large globally distributed presence and sophisticated traffic acceleration, massive backbone capacity, 100% uptime guarantee, and innovative Remote Browser Isolation.

content.value: "Today, Cloudflare helps prevent our users from sharing sensitive data and code with tools like ChatGPT and Bard, enabling us to take advantage of AI safely. Going forward, we are excited for Cloudflare's continued innovations to protect data, and in particular, their vision and roadmap for services like DLP and CASB."

relatedBlades.title: Block shadow IT, control access to SaaS applications, and prevent risky sharing that may result in data loss or non-compliance.

columnContent.title: Stop shadow IT
columnContent.description: Cloudflare logs every connection and request to reveal unsanctioned SaaS applications and what actions users are taking within them. Easily build policies to block or allow access to such apps.

columnContent.title: Control application access
columnContent.description: Identify which SaaS, web, and private applications users are accessing  then apply data controls and identity/device-driven policies to shrink your attack surface.

columnContent.title: Safeguard valuable IP and developer code
columnContent.description: Prevent users from sharing sensitive data in SaaS apps, and easily detect and remediate misconfigurations that risk data exposure and code leaks.
